author: sofi.heessen
title: AKI: Agile Katalyst Intrapreneurs
description: The current funding system requires work to be planned in advance. Rapid Funding without it requires other forms of input and accountability
solution: Design a framework which combines a development team and a group of representative stakeholders to guide and assess the work iteratively
experience:
7 years experience working in agile development, various roles: Scrum master, dev, Product owner
Active Catalyst member since feb 2021
